columns.subtitle: Why Choose Shopify and Shopify Plus for B2B and Wholesale?
columns.content:
Shopify and Shopify Plus offer a powerful, integrated solution for B2B and wholesale businesses, streamlining operations and enhancing efficiency. By consolidating inventory, orders, and customer data in one location, Shopify makes it easy to manage retail and wholesale clients alongside your direct-to-consumer (DTC) customers. B2B features like custom pricing, volume-based discounts, and tailored customer experiences allow businesses to operate from a single platform while offering flexible billing options, including pricing in multiple currencies and custom price lists.

Shopify’s wholesale functionality includes a dedicated order center, enabling clients to place orders at their convenience, eliminating manual order forms and lengthy processes. This feature is particularly valuable for businesses expanding globally or serving diverse markets, making wholesale orders as seamless as DTC transactions. columns.subtitle: What Are the Challenges of Using Shopify for B2B?
columns.content: Before integrating B2B functionality into your Shopify store, consider these key factors to ensure the best experience for both your business and customers:
highlights: Customer Accounts: You'll need to create separate customer accounts for B2B transactions to utilize Shopify’s B2B features.
Third-Party App Compatibility:Since Shopify B2B is a newer feature, some third-party apps may not yet be compatible. Check compatibility before integrating.
Subscription Limitations: B2B functionality does not currently support subscription models. If your business relies on subscriptions, alternative solutions may be needed.
Order Limits?: The B2B system limits orders to 500 line items. Orders exceeding this will be rejected, so plan accordingly for large bulk orders.

data.subtitle: SHOPIFY B2B STOREFRONT
data.title: Create a Custom Domain and B2B Storefront on Shopify
data.content:
Shopify’s B2B features integrate seamlessly with Shopify Plus, letting you manage retail and wholesale customers in one storefront. Pricing and checkout adjust automatically based on the logged-in customer. For a fully customized B2B experience with dynamic content, custom coding may be needed.

Shopify Plus offers a dedicated Wholesale Channel with a password-protected storefront for wholesale customers, keeping B2B pricing hidden from retail clients. Pricing adjusts automatically, and you can customize the domain for a branded B2B experience. For advanced features and deeper customization, We can help enhance your B2B operations.

data.title: Processing B2B Orders on Shopify
data.content:
Managing B2B and wholesale orders is simple with Shopify Wholesale’s advanced order processing features. Orders placed through your wholesale store appear as draft orders in your Shopify admin, allowing easy review and invoice creation with payment instructions.

Here’s how you can process orders:
features: invoices with payment requests by Shopify’s integrated payment provider.
Customize invoices and offer payment via methods like bank wire transfers.
Accept upfront payments through credit cards, checks, and other options.
Provide flexible payment terms with gateways.
